author: timw
msg: Suppressing sending of Content-Length header at all times that it shouldn't be sent (Content-Length > 4GB and Transfer-Encoding:chunked).
IIS appears to provide a Content-Length header under some circumstances when the chunk encoded request can be entirely decoded into the available buffer.
